name: Snake Plant
description: Tall, upright leaves with striking green patterns. Great for air purification.

care.water: Every 2–3 weeks (allow soil to dry out)

name: Pothos
description: Fast-growing vine with heart-shaped green or variegated leaves.

care.water: Once a week or when soil feels dry

name: Peace Lily
description: Glossy green leaves with elegant white flowers. Improves indoor air.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Shiny, dark green leaves with thick stems. Very low-maintenance.

name: Spider Plant
description: Green leaves with white stripes. Produces baby plants easily.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent with thick, healing leaves. Drought-tolerant and useful.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Large, glossy leaves that add a bold touch to indoor spaces. Air-purifying and stylish.

care.water: Once a week (allow topsoil to dry)

name: Boston Fern
description: Lush green fronds with a feathery appearance. Great for humid environments.
